statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions_with_ads;
SELECT user_id, ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions_with_ads;
SELECT ad_id, user_id, timestamp FROM user_interactions_with_ads ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions_with_ads WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM user_interactions_with_ads GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions_with_ads WHERE user_id = 'd45e501f-716c-4b20-9f6e-6890bae6cf40';
SELECT ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions_with_ads WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM user_interactions_with_ads WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions_with_ads WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interaction_count FROM user_interactions_with_ads GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY interaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM AdTargeting ORDER BY created_time DESC;
SELECT ad_name, target_audience FROM AdTargeting WHERE ad_type = 'video';
SELECT user_id, ad_id, interaction_time FROM UserInteractions WHERE ad_id = 12345;
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, ad_id, interaction_type, interaction_time FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, target_audience, created_time FROM AdTargeting WHERE ad_type = 'Sponsored' ORDER BY created_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type IN ('Click', 'View') AND interaction_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY interaction_time LIMIT 20;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT ad_id) AS unique_ads_viewed FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT ad_id) >= 3 ORDER BY unique_ads_viewed DESC;
SELECT ad_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY ad_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click';
SELECT ad_name, ad_category, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_cost > 1000 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT user_id, ad_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_date = '2022-01-15' ORDER BY user_id, ad_id;
SELECT user_id, ad_category, preference_level FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT ad_category, COUNT(*) FROM user_preferences GROUP BY ad_category ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_name, ad_category, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_cost > 1000 AND ad_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM user_interactions JOIN ads ON user_interactions.ad_id = ads.ad_id WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost, ad_category FROM ads WHERE ad_category IN ('Clothing', 'Shoes') ORDER BY ad_cost DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_level, ad_category FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_level > 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, name FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT ad_title, ad_content FROM ads WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM ad_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT ad_id, target_audience, targeting_parameters, user_preferences FROM ad_targeting WHERE target_audience = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, name, gender FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, ad_content FROM ads WHERE target_audience = 'Sports Fans' ORDER BY ad_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, ad_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM ad_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT ad_id, target_audience, targeting_parameters, user_preferences FROM ad_targeting WHERE ad_id IN (SELECT ad_id FROM ads WHERE ad_title LIKE '%Promo%') ORDER BY ad_id;
SELECT * FROM Advertisements;
SELECT ad_title, ad_content FROM Advertisements WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT user_name, user_age, user_location FROM Users WHERE user_gender = 'Female';
SELECT ad_title, ad_content, ad_id FROM Advertisements ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM Users ORDER BY user_age;
SELECT ad_title, ad_content FROM Advertisements;
SELECT user_name, user_location FROM Users WHERE user_age > 30;
SELECT ad_title, ad_content, interaction_type FROM Advertisements JOIN UserInteractions ON Advertisements.ad_id = UserInteractions.ad_id;
SELECT * FROM AdClicks WHERE click_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';

SELECT ad_title, ad_id, user_name FROM Advertisements JOIN AdImpressions ON Advertisements.ad_id = AdImpressions.ad_id JOIN Users ON AdImpressions.user_id = Users.user_id WHERE user_gender = 'Female';
